subject: Horse Racing
Triple Crown (Horse Racing)
Horses
Cruelty to Animals
organizations: New York State Racing and Wagering Board
lead_paragraph: The New York State Police charged Ernie Paragallo with 22 counts of animal cruelty on Friday for neglecting the horses on his breeding farm.
snippet: The New York State Police charged Ernie Paragallo with 22 counts of animal cruelty on Friday for neglecting the horses on his breeding farm.
